author: Dalai Lama
message: With the realization of ones own potential and self-confidence in ones ability, one can build a better world.
title: Thought of the day

author: Nelson Mandela
message: There is nothing like returning to a place that remains unchanged to find the ways in which you yourself have altered.
title: Thought of the day

author: Robert Anthony
message: Forget about all the reasons why something may not work. You only need to find one good reason why it will.
title: Thought of the day

author: Aristotle
message: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
title: Thought of the day
